author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Ekitan to offer off-floor distribution of shares
text:
Feb 15 (Reuters) - Ekitan & Co Ltd
* Says it will offer an off-floor distribution of 200,000 shares on Tokyo Stock Exchange between Feb. 26 and Feb. 28
* Offering price will be determined based on the closing share price of the day before the distribution
* Says the limitation for distribution is up to 6,000 shares for each customer
Source text in Japanese: goo.gl/af5M1S
Further company coverage: (Beijing Headline News)
